Interface netscape.application.ExtendedTarget

public interface ExtendedTarget
extends Target
Interface enabling a Target to declare the commands it can perform. For example, a TextView implements the ExtendedTarget interface and returns true when asked if it can perform the ExtendedTarget.SET_FONT command. The static strings defined by this interface have special meaning within the IFC library.

See Also:
Target

COPY
Command to copy
CUT
Command to cut
NEW_FONT_SELECTION
Command to set the current font in the Font Chooser.
PASTE
Command to paste
SET_FONT
Command to change font to the one passed as the "data" argument.
SHOW_COLOR_CHOOSER
Command to make the ColorChooser visible.
SHOW_FONT_CHOOSER
Command to make the FontChooser visible.

canPerformCommand(String)
Returns true if the object can perform command.

SET_FONT 
 public static final String SET_FONT
Command to change font to the one passed as the "data" argument.

NEW_FONT_SELECTION 
 public static final String NEW_FONT_SELECTION
Command to set the current font in the Font Chooser.

SHOW_FONT_CHOOSER 
 public static final String SHOW_FONT_CHOOSER
Command to make the FontChooser visible.

SHOW_COLOR_CHOOSER 
 public static final String SHOW_COLOR_CHOOSER
Command to make the ColorChooser visible.

 public static final String COPY
Command to copy

CUT 
 public static final String CUT
Command to cut

PASTE 
 public static final String PASTE
Command to paste

canPerformCommand 
 public abstract boolean canPerformCommand(String command)
Returns true if the object can perform command.
